snippet: After Seth Kugel, the Frugal Traveler, recounted spending seven nights in seven rooms in Manhattan for $150 or so apiece, we asked our readers on Twitter if they had ever found such inexpensive lodging in New York. Some responses:
abstract: After Seth Kugel, the Frugal Traveler, recounted spending seven nights in seven rooms in Manhattan for $150 or so apiece, we asked our readers on Twitter if they had ever found such inexpensive lodging in New York. Some responses:

headline.main: Readers Share Views on Sub-$150 Hotels in Manhattan
